basic.name: Ravi Teja Rapolu
basic.summary: Graduate Student, at GW. I work on Backend and Frontend with AWS / GCP . Currently learning about Software Development, Cloud Computing and AI.

experiences.title: Student Technical Support Assistant / Software Developer
details: Providing technical support and troubleshooting for various software applications and systems used within the university.
Collaborating with faculty and staff to resolve software-related issues and improve user experience.
Assisting in the development and implementation of new software solutions to enhance university operations.

experiences.title: Software Developer
details: Developed and maintained software applications using Java and Python, focusing on backend development.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features for existing applications.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to the improvement of coding standards and best practices.

education.title: Master of Science in Computer Science

Projects: Developed a kanban board application using React and Node.js, and a news aggregation platform using Dart and Flutter.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Electronics and Communication Engineering
